```{r,echo=FALSE}
table_two <- params$table
    value <- get_nrc_sentiment(table_two)
     barplot_one<- barplot(
        sort(colSums(prop.table(value[, 1:8]))),
        cex.names = 0.7,
        las = 1,
        main = " Emotional Sentiment by Word",
        col = "lightgreen"

      )
     text(barplot_one, 0, round(x = sort(colSums(prop.table(value[, 1:8]))),digits = 2),cex=1,pos=3)
    
```
